meanings.definition: To change in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar transshaped into a beautiful butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The artist transshaped the clay into a stunning sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand transshaped the pumpkin into a carriage.
meanings.sent4: Time can transshape memories into something entirely different.
meanings.sent5: The chrysalis transshaped into a magnificent monarch butterfly.

meanings.definition: Having been transformed in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The transshaped tree stood out in the forest with its twisted branches.
meanings.sent2: The transshaped building was a unique addition to the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The transshaped cake looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her transshaped hair caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent5: The transshaped clouds painted a beautiful picture in the sky.
